name: Firefight
Lore: 'Lieutenant Page effectively deployed his detachment of Rebel commandos during the attack at the control bunker.',
Text: 'During a battle, if you have weapons at both sites adjacent to that battle, add 3 to your total power and add one battle destiny. OR For remainder of turn, your scout at an exterior site is power +1 and adds 1 to each of that character''s weapon destiny draws.',
